name: Baby Bounce
description:
Jump your Baby as high as you can, bouncing from platform to platform!

Choose your baby, then off they bounce, jumping on beds or out of the bath - but watch out for the flaming candy!!

EASY TO PLAY
• Tilt your device left or right to move your baby
• Bounce on the platforms to jump higher
• Collect coins for a score boost
• Use a continue if you need to keep going!

FEATURES
• Four cute babies to choose from
• Super-boost power-ups
• GameCenter enabled
• High scores
• Achievements
• In-game tutorial
• Super cute sound effects recorded by kids pretending to be babies!

This is a free, ad-supported game - but you can remove the adverts if you want to :)
